item.title: 据说迪拜日落酒店集团将寻求 3 亿美元的扩张资金
item.description: 据熟知内情的人士透露，迪拜日落酒店集团（Sunset Hospitality Group）旗下品牌包括 Sushisamba 连锁餐厅和豪华 METT Hotels & Resorts，该集团正寻求筹集约 3 亿美元用于扩张计划。【原文：Dubai’s Sunset Hospitality Group, which encompasses brands including the Sushisamba restaurant chain and the luxury METT Hotels & Resorts, is seeking to raise about $300 million for expansion plans, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 凯雷私募股权投资公司利润因大量销售而增长
item.description: 凯雷投资集团（Carlyle Group）的私募股权交易商们加快了退出交易的步伐，使得第一季度盈利超过了华尔街的预期。【原文：Carlyle Group’s private equity dealmakers fueled first-quarter earnings that beat Wall Street estimates as they stepped up the pace of exiting deals.】

item.title: 交易员倒计时美联储会议，债券难见起色
item.description: 全球债券市场下一步将从一系列美国经济数据和美联储的决定中寻找线索，所有这些都有可能将固定收益资产的反弹推向更远的未来。【原文：Global bond markets will take their next cue from a slew of US economic data and the Federal Reserve’s decision, all of which risk pushing a rebound in fixed-income assets further into the future.】

item.title: 市场疲软情况下的日元买盘数量显示出干预的局限性
item.description: 日本周一疑似进行了货币干预，这引发了人们的疑问：日本当局需要走多远才能有意义地支撑日元。【原文：Japan’s suspected currency intervention on Monday is raising questions about how far authorities will need to go to meaningfully prop up the yen.】

item.title: 投资基金加大对欧洲天然气价格反弹的押注
item.description: 投资者加大了对欧洲天然气价格上涨的押注，担心随着市场焦点转向为明年冬季建立库存，进一步的供应中断将引发更大的市场波动。【原文：Investors increased bets on higher European natural gas prices, fearing that further supply disruptions will trigger even more market volatility as the focus turns to building stockpiles for next winter.】

item.title: 据说 KPS 将牵头竞购价值 30 亿欧元的西门子电机部门
item.description: 知情人士透露，KPS Capital Partners 正在成为收购西门子公司 Innomotics 大型电机业务的领跑者。【原文：KPS Capital Partners is emerging as the frontrunner to acquire Siemens AG’s Innomotics large motors business, people with knowledge of the matter said.】

item.title: Nord Anglia 吸引 Permira 和 KKR 对 150 亿美元的 EQT 退出感兴趣
item.description: 据知情人士透露，国际学校运营商Nord Anglia正吸引私募股权投资公司和主权财富基金的兴趣，因为该公司的所有者正寻求将其股份货币化。【原文：International school operator Nord Anglia is drawing interest from private equity players and sovereign wealth funds as its owners look to monetize their stakes, according to people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 诺和诺德在丹麦削减对 Ozempic 的补贴
item.description: 在诺和诺德（Novo Nordisk A/S）的母国丹麦，对 Ozempic 的补贴将受到限制，原因是用于这种糖尿病特效药的公共开支不断增加，而这种药物正越来越多地被用作减肥治疗。【原文：Subsidies for Ozempic will be restricted in Novo Nordisk A/S’s home country of Denmark due to rising public spending on the blockbuster diabetes medicine, which is increasingly being used as a weight-loss treatment.】

item.title: 越南议会将在领导人辞职后召开特别会议
item.description: 越南国会主席上周辞职后，国会将于周四下午召开特别会议讨论人事问题。【原文：Vietnam’s National Assembly will convene Thursday afternoon for a special meeting to discuss personnel issues after its chairman resigned last week.】

item.title: 壳牌退出中国电力业务以提高回报率
item.description: 去年年底，壳牌公司退出了在中国的电力业务，继续调整投资重点，以提高盈利能力。【原文：Shell Plc exited its power business in China at the end of last year as the company continues to refocus its investments in a bid to drive up profitability.】

item.title: BBVA 的交易欲望预示着欧洲银行将发生更大的动荡
item.description: 动物精神似乎正在重返欧洲银行业。【原文：The animal spirits look like they’re returning to European banking.】

item.title: 英国天然气价格随着风力发电量的下降而波动
item.description: 由于风力发电量减少，英国天然气价格出现波动，从而刺激了对化石燃料的需求。【原文：Britain’s natural gas prices fluctuated as wind generation eased, boosting demand for the fossil fuel.】

item.title: 寄希望于美联储放缓缩表的债券交易面临考验
item.description: 美国债券将开始超越德国同类债券的逆向呼声正在获得支持，这将使今年最受欢迎的债券交易之一面临风险。【原文：A contrarian call that US bonds will start to outshine German peers is gaining traction, putting at risk one of the most popular bond trades of the year.】

item.title: 马来西亚前总理之子计划在非洲投资 1 亿美元
item.description: 马来西亚前总理马哈蒂尔-穆罕默德（Mahathir Mohamad）的儿子米尔扎-马哈蒂尔（Mirzan Mahathir）打算投资 1 亿美元在南苏丹建立一家水泥厂。【原文：Mirzan Mahathir, the son of former Malaysian Prime Minister Mahathir Mohamad, intends to invest $100 million in a cement factory in South Sudan.】

item.title: Spinneys 3.75 亿美元的迪拜首次公开募股吸引了价值 190 亿美元的订单
item.description: 高端连锁超市 Spinneys 在迪拜首次公开发行的 3.75 亿美元股票收到了约 710 亿迪拉姆（约合 193 亿美元）的订单，凸显了阿拉伯联合酋长国对罕见的私营企业上市的强烈需求。【原文：High-end supermarket chain Spinneys received about 71 billion dirhams ($19.3 billion) in orders for its $375 million Dubai initial public offering, underscoring strong appetite for a rare private sector listing in the United Arab Emirates.】

item.title: 石油活动减少，沙特经济萎缩缓解
item.description: 由于持续的石油减产对石油经济的拖累减少，沙特阿拉伯的经济衰退在今年前三个月有所缓解。【原文：Saudi Arabia’s economic downturn eased in the first three months of the year as ongoing oil production cuts acted as less of a drag on the oil economy.】

item.title: 彼得斯说，新西兰距离决定加入奥库斯还有很长的路要走
item.description: 新西兰外交部长温斯顿-彼得斯（Winston Peters）说，新西兰距离决定是否加入《奥库斯安全条约》的第二支柱还有很长的路要走。【原文：New Zealand is a long way from deciding whether to join the second pillar of the Aukus security pact, Foreign Minister Winston Peters said.】

item.title: 国际货币基金组织批准向马里提供 1.2 亿美元紧急融资支持
item.description: 马里与国际货币基金组织达成了 1.2 亿美元紧急融资的工作人员级别协议。【原文：Mali reached a staff level agreement with the International Monetary Fund for $120 million of emergency financing.】

item.title: Setser 说：巨大的外汇收益是日本从干预中获得的好处
item.description: 美国外交关系委员会高级研究员布拉德-塞泽尔（Brad Setser）认为，如果日本政府官员周一确实通过卖出美元、买入日元的方式干预了货币市场，那么日本政府有望获得 "意外 "利润。【原文：The Japanese government can expect to have realized “windfall” profits if officials did indeed intervene in currency markets by selling dollars and buying yen on Monday, according to Brad Setser, a senior fellow at the Council on Foreign Relations.】

item.title: 戈德瑞集团拆分集团以维护家庭 "和谐
item.description: 控制着消费品、金融服务和房地产等业务的印度戈德里杰家族宣布，将拆分这家拥有 125 年历史的企业集团，以 "保持和谐，更好地协调所有权"。【原文：India’s Godrej family, which controls businesses spanning consumer goods, financial services and real estate, has announced it will split the 125-year-old conglomerate to “maintain harmony and better align ownership.”】

item.title: 美联储还不会下台。其他人等不及了
item.description:
我们的 "危险下降年 "系列报道显示，大型央行无法永远等待美国开始降息— ，但仍担心会先下手为强。【原文：

Our series on The Year of Descending Dangerously shows big central banks can’t hang on forever for the US to start cutting rates — but still fear going first.

item.title: 美元主导地位解析
item.description:
该货币规模庞大、稳定，在全球经济中根深蒂固，这也是它成为引人注目的目标的原因。【原文：

The currency is big, stable and entrenched in the global economy — which is also why it’s become a compelling target.

】

item.title: 加息风险攀升，新兴市场债券押注泡汤
item.description: 随着一些新兴市场央行面临加息压力，而不是像几周前普遍预期的那样降息，全球投资者正在解除对本币债券的押注。【原文：Global investors are unwinding bets on local-currency bonds as some emerging-market central banks come under pressure to raise interest rates — rather than cut them as widely anticipated just weeks ago.】

item.title: 巴菲特青睐的三井物产宣布回购股票和股票分割
item.description: 巴菲特青睐的日本贸易公司三井物产株式会社（Mitsui & Co.【原文：Warren Buffett-favored Japanese trading firm Mitsui & Co. announced that it will buy back up to 200 billion yen ($1.3 billion) worth of shares, as it looks to boost investor returns.】

item.title: 市场为美联储会议的鹰派基调做好准备，黄金保持跌势
item.description: 由于火热的美国经济数据进一步削弱了美联储迅速转向宽松货币政策的希望，黄金维持了上一交易日的大幅跌势。【原文：Gold held its hefty decline in the previous session, as hot US economic data further dented hopes the Federal Reserve will rapidly pivot to monetary easing.】

item.title: 中国股市迎来一年来最长外资买入潮
item.description: 外国基金连续第三个月增持中国股票，预计劳动节假期后中央政治局会议的积极政策基调将提振市场情绪。【原文：Foreign funds boosted holdings of Chinese shares for the third straight month, with positive policy tone from the Politburo meeting expected to bolster sentiment after the Labor Day holiday.】

item.title: 中东停火前景和美国通胀引发石油持续下跌
item.description: 由于中东停火有望缓解紧张局势，以及在美联储会议召开前，通胀上升的迹象对美国需求前景构成压力，石油延续跌势。【原文：Oil extended a decline on the prospect a cease-fire in the Middle East will ease tensions and as signs of elevated inflation weigh on the outlook for US demand ahead of a Federal Reserve meeting.】

item.title: 品尼高公司发展迅速，鲁特将加入新的联营公司
item.description: Pinnacle 投资管理集团将成立一家新的附属公司，在这家澳大利亚公司的下一步国际扩张中，包括 Peter Rutter 在内的前皇家伦敦资产管理公司全球股票团队成员将加入该公司。【原文：Pinnacle Investment Management Group will create a new affiliate that will house former members of Royal London Asset Management’s global equities team, including Peter Rutter, in the next leg of the Australian firm’s international expansion.】
